VRFieldOfView.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The VRFieldOfView interface of the WebVR API represents a field of view defined by 4 different degree values describing the view from a center point.

blockquote.para: This interface was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRFieldOfViewRightDegrees.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The rightDegrees read-only property of the interface returns the number of degrees to the right that the field of view extends in.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRFieldOfViewDownDegrees.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The downDegrees read-only property of the interface returns the number of degrees downwards that the field of view extends in.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRFieldOfViewLeftDegrees.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The leftDegrees read-only property of the interface returns the number of degrees to the left that the field of view extends in.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRFieldOfViewUpDegrees.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The upDegrees read-only property of the interface returns the number of degrees upwards that the field of view extends in.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.
